story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: Thanks for training with me, Lorelei!
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Learning from an Elite Four member is a
dream come true! I’ve always looked up
to you!
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: *chuckle* No need to be so formal.
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I’d love for you to do your best. Fight on my
behalf as well, OK?
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
After all, I’m happy to cheer on anyone who
admires me...
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
But you and I—we have the same policy:
winning with our favorite type.
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: Starmie and I are so motivated now!
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Of all the Water-type Pokémon you could
have chosen, why choose Starmie for
awakening your arc suit?
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
I guess because Starmie’s the Pokémon
I count on most!
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Sure, there are other reliable water
Pokémon.
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
But Starmie’s extra special, because we’ve
battled so many challengers together in my
time as a Gym Leader!
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
If this tournament is for Gym Leaders aiming
for the top, I should choose Starmie!
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Hearing you talk has lit a fire in my
heart, too!
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: Let’s get back to training, shall we?
story_arceus_08_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: You can’t win on feelings alone, after all!
